text: The Front Page is a 1974 American black comedy movie directed by Billy Wilder and was the third adaptation of Ben Hecht and Charles MacArthur's 1928 play of the same name. It stars Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau, Susan Sarandon, Vincent Gardenia, David Wayne, Carol Burnett, Allen Garfield, Charles Durning, Allen Jenkins and Martin Gabel. The Front Page was released by Universal Pictures on December 18, 1974. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1974 comedy-drama movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Billy Wilder Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s black comedy movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:1970s romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:1974 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:Movies set in the 1920s Category:Movies about capital punishment Category:Movies about journalists Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Movies set in Chicago
title: The Front Page (1974 movie)
